the drops donâ€™t work.

i putted this in in item2.

public static int Abyssal[] = {3140, 4087, 4585, 4587, 4756, 4732}; public static int randomAbyssal() { return Abyssal[(int)(Math.random()*Abyssal.length)]; }

and this is in npchandler

if(npcs[1615].npcType == 1615) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomAbyssal(), npcs[1615].absX, npcs[1615].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(1615), false); }
